basic_info.description: I’m Chloe Nott and I'm a former manufacturing engineer who is currently pursuing additional education in software development. I decided to change my path partly because I really enjoyed playing with data while I was a manufacturing engineer and partly because I am confused why data isn’t used more than it is in other contexts. I think part of the reason is because there’s still more opportunities to make user friendly software tools to make that happen, so hopefully I can help with that in the future. In any case, I’m currently enjoying learning a new skill at the moment, and this introduction will likely change as I progress over the next few months.

projects.title: Mental Health Website
projects.description: This is an informational mental health website created for a group project with Brandon Wolf and Ibraheem Ibraheem. One of its main features is a questionnaire that screens for symptoms of various mental health conditions.

projects.title: Big Textbox
projects.description: This iOS app displays very large editable text on a phone screen. The font size adjusts as needed to fit on the screen. Favorite phrases can be added to the favorites list also! Intended for quick non-verbal in-person communication since my mask tends to make my already quiet voice practically incomprehensible.
